definition: something used to lure fish or other animals into danger so they can be trapped or killed, lure or entrap with or as if with a decoy
details:
noun
- something used to lure fish or other animals into danger so they can be trapped or killed
= synonyms: bait
- something used to trick, mislead, or lure into danger
= example: something used to trick, mislead, or lure into danger
= synonyms: steerer
verb
- lure or entrap with or as if with a decoy
